column1: Great to see our next Vice President @KamalaHarris visit Las Vegas and spend time hearing from Latino leaders!   Our Latino community has been hit disproportionately hard by #COVID19 and we need to work together to build back better.  https://t.co/grVPNQPcvo

The President knew how deadly COVID-19 was back in February and yet played down the threat.   Since then we’ve lost almost 200000 Americans to this cruel virus: mothers fathers brothers sisters friends.   The President endangered the American people and we deserve better. https://t.co/OXrjmQ6CMc

Together with Nevada’s women leaders I’m calling out President Trump for his efforts to strike down the ACA mishandling #COVID19 and handing out corporate tax breaks.   He's failed America's women and we deserve better leadership.   That leader is @JoeBiden. https://t.co/xaiAa97CYz

We're facing a lot of challenges as a nation from the #COVID19 pandemic to the fight for racial justice.  Instead of offering positive solutions all we've heard at the RNC convention this week has been division & extreme partisanship.  We have to elect @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris

#COVID19 isn’t a partisan issue.  Thank you @DeanHeller Governor Sandoval and @Hutch4Nevada for reminding Nevadans of these simple important steps we must take to overcome this pandemic.  https://t.co/KuXaXWsRoe

I’m honored to serve alongside @CatherineforNV.  She is a force who has made fighting for Nevada her life’s work.   I’m proud to be her partner in the Senate as we fight for Nevada’s hardworking families to overcome #COVID19 and beyond.
